title: Hour 2: A Record Number Of Bros
description:
With news of the Washington Commander hiring BofA Securities to explore selling the team, we discuss Daniel Snyder being able to cash out despite gross incompetence, who takes over the mantle as "most hated owner," and who could replace Snyder in Washington. Then, Nick Swisher joins the show with potentially the most energy anyone has ever brought to an interview to discuss wearing a thong for superstitious reasons, how baseball’s evolved since he played, charging the mound, skin care routines, and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
